text: Sa’ad da aka gama dukan wannan, sai Isra’ilawan da suke can suka fita zuwa garuruwan Yahuda, suka rurrushe keɓaɓɓun duwatsu suka kuma farfashe ginshiƙan Ashera. Suka rurrushe masujadan kan tudu da bagadai, ko’ina a Yahuda da Benyamin da kuma cikin Efraim da Manasse. Bayan sun rurrushe dukansu, sai Isra’ilawa suka koma garuruwansu, kowanne zuwa mahallinsa.
